channel.title: composer on Spade Three
channel.description: Recent content in composer on Spade Three

item.title: Php Composer
item.description: composer php -r "copy('https://getcomposer.org/installer', 'composer-setup.php');" php -r "if (hash_file('sha384', 'composer-setup.php') === 'a5c698ffe4b8e849a443b120cd5ba38043260d5c4023dbf93e1558871f1f07f58274fc6f4c93bcfd858c6bd0775cd8d1') { echo 'Installer verified'; } else { echo 'Installer corrupt'; unlink('composer-setup.php'); } echo PHP_EOL;" php composer-setup.php php -r "unlink('composer-setup.php');" echo @php "%~dp0composer.phar" %*>composer.bat composer -V php composer.phar self-update composer use php composer.phar create-project doctrine/orm path 2.2.* AND php composer.phar require xxx php composer.phar remove xxx OR edit composer.json php composer.phar install php composer.phar update php composer.
